body_html: @fmassa Thank you for the implementation of ROIPool/Align. You mention that this will be released as part of 0.4 for torchvision and I had a look at the current release.. it is 0.2.0 (released in Nov.27, 2017). Any idea how long before 0.3 and 0.4 ?

body: @fmassa Thank you for the implementation of ROIPool/Align. You mention that this will be released as part of 0.4 for torchvision and I had a look at the current release.. it is 0.2.0 (released in Nov.27, 2017). Any idea how long before 0.3 and 0.4 ?
